topics.body: _*And now for something completely different*_
topics.author: 4fde0c7e945b706cc30003eb

topics.body:
*Once we're in*

Okay, Let's finish this quick

*CLOCK UP*

*Time Slows down to a crawl for me*

*I start beating the shit out of the monster*

@123@

Rider Kick

@RIDER KICK@

*I end the monster with a rider kick*

*Due to the fight being over, I somehow get deposited back out the gap*

@CLOCK OVER@

*The fight began and ended in a few milliseconds*
